summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6238 for the improvement of 11th Ave. Southwest from West Henderson Street to West Roxbury Street; and certain other streets and avenues; (all streets and avenues designated in this ordinance are in accordance with the street nomenclature in effect at the time said local improvement district was created, and not as subsequently modified by Ordinance No. 89910) by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 89682, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
